sources.title: Death Machines
sources.description: A trio of mind-controlled assassins are dispatched to help a crime boss seize control of her territory. You can find out more about this movie on its IMDB page .

sources.title: Death Machines (1976)
sources.description: Madame Lu has created three "Death Machines," a trio of martial arts experts who have been injected with a special serum, turning them into mindless zombies, capable only of murder, at Lu's command. Tasked with eliminating her enemies, the Death Machines go on a blood-soaked rampage, killing anyone in their path. After they massacre an entire dojo, leaving only one survivor, the Death Machines and Madame Lu herself become the targets of his vengeance... Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/death-machines-1976/

metadata.Plot: An evil Oriental Dragon Lady injects three martial arts fighters with a serum that turns them into zombie-like assassins, and she sends them out against her enemies.
metadata.Actors: Ronald L. Marchini, Michael Chong, Joshua Johnson
